body_html: @fangweili and I were discussing offline. Now that SessionBundle is in contrib, the next natural step is to update the inception model / retrain.py to directly use the SessionBundle Exporter. Contributions welcome though we may get to it over the coming weeks.
body_text: @fangweili and I were discussing offline. Now that SessionBundle is in contrib, the next natural step is to update the inception model / retrain.py to directly use the SessionBundle Exporter. Contributions welcome though we may get to it over the coming weeks.
body: @fangweili and I were discussing offline. Now that [SessionBundle](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/session_bundle) is in contrib, the next natural step is to update the inception model / retrain.py to directly use the SessionBundle Exporter. Contributions welcome though we may get to it over the coming weeks.
